name: Haroldian Civilization
description:
**This is a submission for a game jam called "Harold Jam 2023: Ascent of the Allies." The potential play time of this game is less than one (1) hour.

"Marsha, don't give up. Harold will, and always, remember you..." Upon the decision to return to Earth after a promising mission, a force emerges... Growing at exponentially high frequencies, the crew of HAROLD HEART IV face a moment that changes everything they've ever had... (Oh no!!) Features:

— No levels and no grinding: stat increases are managed by the skill tree system using Knowledge Points acquired from battle.
— Skill tree system: unique skill trees for each character that can aid your battles.
— Strategic turn-based combat: a battle system where a typical JRPG "attack, attack, and attack" will not usually work; some basic thinking may be required to have an advantage in battle!
— Tactical battles: In addition to the standard turn-based combat, there is a tactical battle system for fleet and army combat.
